001package com.technototes.library.hardware2;
002
003import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
004
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareMap;
006
007public class HardwareBuilder<T> {
008
009    private static HardwareMap hardwareMap = null;
010
011    public static HardwareMap getMap() {
012        return hardwareMap;
013    }
014
015    public static void initMap(HardwareMap h) {
016        // fix to maintain old code
017        com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice.hardwareMap = h;
018        hardwareMap = h;
019    }
020
021    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked cast")
022    public static <T> T create(String s) {
023        if (hardwareMap == null) return null;
024        return hardwareMap.get((Class<T>) Object.class, s);
025    }
026    // TODO
027    public static <T> T create(int port) {
028        if (hardwareMap == null) return null;
029        return null;
030    }
031
032    protected T product;
033
034    public HardwareBuilder(String name) {
035        this(HardwareBuilder.<T>create(name));
036    }
037
038    public HardwareBuilder(T device) {
039        product = device;
040    }
041
042    public HardwareBuilder(int port) {
043        this(HardwareBuilder.<T>create(port));
044    }
045
046    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked cast")
047    public <U extends T> U build() {
048        try {
049            return (U) product;
050        } catch (ClassCastException e) {
051            e.printStackTrace();
052            return null;
053        }
054    }
055
056    public HardwareBuilder<T> apply(UnaryOperator<T> operator) {
057        product = operator.apply(product);
058        return this;
059    }
060
061    public static AnalogBuilder analog(String name) {
062        return new AnalogBuilder(name);
063    }
064
065    public static ColorBuilder color(String name) {
066        return new ColorBuilder(name);
067    }
068
069    public static ColorRangeBuilder colorRange(String name) {
070        return new ColorRangeBuilder(name);
071    }
072
073    public static CRServoBuilder crServo(String name) {
074        return new CRServoBuilder(name);
075    }
076
077    public static DigitalBuilder digital(String name) {
078        return new DigitalBuilder(name);
079    }
080
081    public static DistanceBuilder distance(String name) {
082        return new DistanceBuilder(name);
083    }
084
085    public static IMUBuilder imu(String name) {
086        return new IMUBuilder(name);
087    }
088
089    public static MotorBuilder motor(String name) {
090        return new MotorBuilder(name);
091    }
092
093    public static ServoBuilder servo(String name) {
094        return new ServoBuilder(name);
095    }
096
097    public static AnalogBuilder analog(int port) {
098        return new AnalogBuilder(port);
099    }
100
101    public static CRServoBuilder crServo(int port) {
102        return new CRServoBuilder(port);
103    }
104
105    public static DigitalBuilder digital(int port) {
106        return new DigitalBuilder(port);
107    }
108
109    public static MotorBuilder motor(int port) {
110        return new MotorBuilder(port);
111    }
112
113    public static ServoBuilder servo(int port) {
114        return new ServoBuilder(port);
115    }
116}
